Quet tooks Kup's hand and shook it

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> : : Kup : :
> 
> Kup: I believe we can call it that.
> 
> Kup smiles, offering his hand, to sign the deal.
> 
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Quet:
> 
> "That sounds as a non-agression pact"1said cheerfully the male
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > : : Kup : :
> > 
> > Kup: So you were a mostly Autobot team, sent to protect the Ark, 
by 
> Optimus, or at least the Optimus of your dimension, and Scourge 
> betrayed you. Hmm. I feel that we should trust each others 
factions. 
> I'm sure your Autobots and the Maximal forces here could work 
> together.
> > 
> > 
> > foxmanroar1@a... wrote:
> > GrimLock looked down. "I... Was King of the Dino-Bots... Prime 
> asked me to be a guardian, and with me my fellows, but the traitor 
> Scourge attacked us, he nearly destroyed the others... He Killed 
> Mirage..., and he placed me in a position where if my young friend 
> here had not rebuilt me in this new form I would have faced a 
system 
> crash... Scourge had my mind upgraded... and now not only do I 
know I 
> failed, but he has taken Slag, Sludge, swoop, and snarl."
